title: Towards the Next!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Is everyone here~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Yep~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Alright, let’s toast then.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’ll do the honors! Thanks for the hard work, everyone! Cheers~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Cheers!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>This tea is delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>That’s because we all worked so hard.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>There were some tough moments, but now I can only recall the fun things.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I know a saying that describes that feeling. “Once on shore, we pray no more.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Oh, that was a line from the anime we watched the other day, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Come on, Setsuna!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Hehe, you’re so cute, Mia-chan. Rina-chan Board says, “Blush.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Rina, you too, stop it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>But you know, the fun things aren’t forgotten once you’re “on shore”!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>That’s right. I’ll never forget those memories, and I’ll always treasure them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>It’d be great if we could keep making lots of memories like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes! Memories are treasures that last a lifetime!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Then, let’s do even more live concerts!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I agree with Kasumi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Shioriko-chan, please give us permission to use the auditorium~ 𝅘𝅥𝅮 I want to hold a concert right away!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Hehe. Then, shall we all construct a plan for the next concert together?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Let’s dash towards the next one~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
